title: Barenboim on Beethoven - Concerts 5 and 6
description:
Music Videos : Classical : DVD quality


In 2005, legendary pianist Daniel Barenboim performed the complete Beethoven piano sonatas over 8 concerts in 2 weeks at the Staatsoper in Berlin.

These definitive performances were lavishly filmed and beautifully produced to bring to the world these masterpieces in their entirety.


Concert 5:

Piano Sonata No. 7 in D, Opus 10 No. 3

Piano Sonata No. 13 in E Flat, Opus 27 No. 1

Piano Sonata No. 27 in E Minor, Opus 90

Piano Sonata No. 21 in C, Opus 53 - The Waldstein



Concert 6:

Piano Sonata No. 15 in D, Opus 28 - The Pastoral

Piano Sonata No. 3 in C, Opus 2 No. 3

Piano Sonata No. 24 in F Sharp, Opus 78

Piano Sonata No. 30 in E, Opus 109
